stories.title: Novo Nordisk reports 19.7% weight loss in triple agonist trialPublished1 hour agoThe Phase 2 results for UBT251 come days after Novo Nordisk's CagriSema failed to match Eli Lilly's Zepbound in a separate obesity trial.42 sources
